Grade: 95

Comment: The response beautifully expands on the transformation of the symbol of the cross from one of shame and suffering to one of hope, victory, and redemption through Jesus' resurrection. It effectively connects the Roman practice of crucifixion to early Christian theology, demonstrating a deep understanding of the Christian worldview. The analysis provided is thorough and insightful, and it effectively addresses the specified concern. Great job!
